channel.title: 317 [PI] objects
channel.description:
Hello,
base project insanity
I have deleted some objects but now if i login i see the objects for 1second or 2 and than it removes again. see pictures below, picture 1 i see a few seconds if i login.
Picture 1 [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/11vhavl.png[/img]
Picture 2 [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2l94obq.png[/img]
so i was wondering if could make it that they never come up, becuz i deleted them.
thank you

item.title: 317 [PI] objects
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

TheGodzGang:

So what is the best way to fix this?

delete them from the world data in the cache, which would be distributed to the players the next time they logged in

Read full topic

item.title: 317 [PI] objects
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

zyle1992:

What you did was basically say “once the player is initialized, delete them for the player”. One thing you might be able to do is actually delete them from the world data in the cache, which would be distributed to the players the next time they logged in. That would do it. Not sure how easy that is these days.

Depends on if he’s loading new map data or not. Don’t think there’s any map editor (for the 317 cache/mapdata) that supports newer map data. If that makes sense.

Also, an fyi: generally when you’re “removing” them in this method it’s just spawning an object with the ID of -1 over the current object. Not really removing.

Read full topic

item.description:

What you did was basically say “once the player is initialized, delete them for the player”. One thing you might be able to do is actually delete them from the world data in the cache, which would be distributed to the players the next time they logged in. That would do it. Not sure how easy that is these days.
